project_title: Use Social Media Trends data to tell a story
brief_description: Analyse social data, tell visual stories, and capture insights.
detailed_description: Analyze and visualize social media engagement data to uncover trending topics, audience preferences, and sentiment insights. Present findings using dashboards and storytelling techniques that make data engaging and easy to interpret.
core_features: Collect and organize social media data
Create interactive Excel dashboards
Use PivotCharts for trend visualization
Apply storytelling principles to data insights

project_title: Slice and dice data to support business
brief_description: Design, manage, and analyze patient data
detailed_description: Develop a relational database for hospital operations to manage patient records, appointments, staff details, and treatments. Use SQL queries and stored procedures to efficiently retrieve and analyze medical data.
core_features: Design ER diagrams for hospital workflows
Create and normalize relational tables
Develop SQL queries and stored procedures
Generate analytical reports on patient and staff data

project_title: Show case and sharpen Python coding
brief_description: Build a smart finance tracker on daily expenses.
detailed_description: Develop a Python-based financial tracker that helps users record, categorize, and analyze expenses. Implement data structures and file handling to store and process financial data efficiently.
core_features: Add, update, and delete expense records
Categorize expenses automatically
Generate monthly and category-wise reports
Store data persistently using file handling

project_title: Work like a Data Analyst on E-commerce Behavior
brief_description: Explore shopper patterns to uncover insights that drive sales.
detailed_description: Analyze e-commerce transaction data to identify patterns in user behavior, popular product categories, and conversion trends. Use Python and visualization tools to derive insights that support marketing strategies.
core_features: Clean and preprocess e-commerce datasets
Perform exploratory data analysis with Pandas
Visualize buying behavior using Seaborn
Identify customer segments and sales drivers

project_title: Work like a BI Analyst on Sales and Revenue
brief_description: Turn business data into powerful, insight-rich dashboards.
detailed_description: Build interactive Power BI dashboards that visualize key sales and revenue metrics. Use Power Query and DAX to clean, transform, and model data for actionable business intelligence.
core_features: Integrate data from multiple business sources
Model relationships between datasets
Create KPIs and measures using DAX
Design interactive, visually appealing dashboards

project_title: Work like a Data Analyst to Predict Customer Churn
brief_description: Identify customers at risk of leaving and boost retention.
detailed_description: Analyze customer behavior data to predict churn using statistical and machine learning techniques. Apply hypothesis testing and inferential statistics to validate patterns and suggest retention strategies.
core_features: Preprocess customer and transaction data
Perform statistical tests and correlation analysis
Build and evaluate churn prediction models
Recommend strategies to improve retention

brief_description: Predict product demand to optimize stock and boost business efficiency.
detailed_description: Develop a complete analytics solution that combines data collection, cleaning, analysis, and machine learning to forecast product demand. Use Python, SQL, Power BI, and Excel for an integrated approach to business intelligence and predictive modeling.
core_features: Collect and integrate data from multiple business sources
Clean and preprocess sales and inventory data
Build machine learning models to forecast demand
Visualize predictions with Power BI dashboards
Use GenAI tools for report generation and insights
